scripts.mobile:build: npm run build && cd mobile && npx cordova build
scripts.mobile:build:android: npm run build && cd mobile && npx cordova build android
scripts.mobile:build:ios: npm run build && cd mobile && npx cordova build ios
scripts.mobile:run:android: npm run mobile:prepare && cd mobile && npx cordova run android
scripts.mobile:run:ios: npm run mobile:prepare && cd mobile && npx cordova run ios
scripts.mobile:open:android: cd mobile && npx cordova open android
scripts.mobile:open:ios: cd mobile && npx cordova open ios
